name: Stairs (itch) (HInquisition)
description:
Stairs - is an indie-horror game where you have to go down the stairs, exploring the secrets of this place. Watch your stamina and sanity to survive. And don't forget to use flashlight to dispel the darkness, where monsters and traps awaits. 

The game could appear absurd and not really serious. Also the game supports replacement of textures(have fun). Inspired by SCP-087-B, where there was very easy access to modifying game files.

H - hide interface.
